desc.1: Unleashes up to 4 attacks in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> and <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.

desc.0: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</ct> is above or equal to 75%, hold <IconNormal /> to activate.
desc.1: Consume 75% <ct color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</ct> to launch consecutive attacks in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: When the Finishing Move hits an enemy, it triggers the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> of the squad member positioned before Seth.
desc.3: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a Dodge to activate:
desc.1: Charge forward with a shield attack, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Damage received during the move is decreased by 40%.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a quick downward slash on enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After the move, hold <IconSpecialReady /> to chain into <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</ct>, enabling faster charging.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.1: Launch two shield attacks forward, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

EXSpecialAttackThunderShieldRushHighVolt.name: EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a series of slashes in front, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Hold <IconSpecialReady />to charge the move, and Seth will dash forward, unleashing a series of powerful slashes, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.4: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while charging this skill, and damage taken is reduced by 40%.
desc.5: Seth is invulnerable during the consecutive slashes.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Launch a series of slashes in front, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.3: After the move, hold <IconSpecialReady /> to chain into <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</ct>, enabling faster charging.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Launch a series of upward attacks in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Activating the move accumulates 75% <ct color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</ct>, and grants 3 additional Assist Points.
desc.3: After the move, hold <IconSpecialReady /> to chain into <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</ct>, enabling faster charging.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a quick downward slash on enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After the move, hold <IconSpecialReady /> to chain into <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</ct>, enabling faster charging.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.3: This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</ct> when the character is under intense attacks.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Launch a forward thrust attack, followed by two horizontal slashes, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> of the squad member positioned before Seth.
desc.3: After activating the move, hold <IconSpecialReady /> to transition to <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</ct> and charge faster.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core.name: Core Passive: Protector
desc: When Seth uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</ct>, he gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>40%</ct> of his initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Public Security Ruling</ct> triggers a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, causing another squad member to enter the field, that squad member gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>40</ct>% of Seth's initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. Having a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> increases Anomaly Proficiency by <ct color=#2BAD00>50</ct>.

When Seth uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</ct>, he gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>50%</ct> of his initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Public Security Ruling</ct> triggers a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, causing another squad member to enter the field, that squad member gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>50</ct>% of Seth's initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. Having a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> increases Anomaly Proficiency by <ct color=#2BAD00>62</ct>.

When Seth uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</ct>, he gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>60%</ct> of his initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Public Security Ruling</ct> triggers a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, causing another squad member to enter the field, that squad member gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>60</ct>% of Seth's initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. Having a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> increases Anomaly Proficiency by <ct color=#2BAD00>75</ct>.

When Seth uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</ct>, he gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>68%</ct> of his initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Public Security Ruling</ct> triggers a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, causing another squad member to enter the field, that squad member gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>68</ct>% of Seth's initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. Having a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> increases Anomaly Proficiency by <ct color=#2BAD00>85</ct>.

When Seth uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</ct>, he gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>72%</ct> of his initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Public Security Ruling</ct> triggers a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, causing another squad member to enter the field, that squad member gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>72</ct>% of Seth's initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. Having a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> increases Anomaly Proficiency by <ct color=#2BAD00>90</ct>.

When Seth uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</ct>, he gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>76%</ct> of his initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Public Security Ruling</ct> triggers a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, causing another squad member to enter the field, that squad member gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>76</ct>% of Seth's initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. Having a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> increases Anomaly Proficiency by <ct color=#2BAD00>95</ct>.

When Seth uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</ct>, he gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>80%</ct> of his initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Public Security Ruling</ct> triggers a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, causing another squad member to enter the field, that squad member gains a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>80</ct>% of Seth's initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. Having a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> increases Anomaly Proficiency by <ct color=#2BAD00>100</ct>.

desc.0: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
desc.1: When Seth's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Final Judgment</ct> or Finishing Move during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</ct> hits an enemy, the target's Anomaly Buildup RES to all Attributes is reduced by 20%, lasting 20s.

1.name: Heroism
1.desc: The shield value provided by <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> and its maximum limit is increased by 30%. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</ct> ends, the Anomaly Proficiency increase provided by <ct color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Protector</ct> lasts an additional 10s.

flavor.0: When it comes to team missions, Seth is always leading the charge.
flavor.1: "Let me handle the arrests! I scored a 99 in close-quarters arrests, and the only point deducted was because I accidentally sprained the instructor's wrist."

2.name: Recklessness of Youth
2.desc: Upon entering battle, Seth immediately gains 75% <ct color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</ct>. Hitting an enemy with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</ct> increases the move's accumulated <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</ct> by 35%.

flavor.0: Many criminals make the mistake of underestimating Seth.
flavor.1: It might be his pure, clear eyes or those innocent-looking furry ears and tail. Whatever the reason, everyone who underestimates him eventually pays the price.

3.name: Slow Reflexes
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "A skilled officer like you must handle everything on your own, right? No help from others, surely?"
flavor.1: Even after hearing this, Seth remained composed and didn't say a word.
flavor.2: It wasn't until midnight that he suddenly woke up: "Could that guy's comment earlier... have been a dig at me?"

4.name: Core Aspiration
4.desc: The Daze caused by <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist: Thundershield</ct> is increased by 25%.

flavor.0: "Put aside your foolish notions of good and evil. You can't protect everyone. Sometimes, you have to make a choice."
flavor.1: "This is my choice, and it's the core responsibility of an officer — you're the one who has changed, Brother."

5.name: Distant Admiration
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: Seth used to deeply admire and respect his older brother. But as you know, "admiration" is the furthest thing from "understanding."
flavor.1: "Someday, I'll become the finest officer... and make him eat his words!"

6.name: Idealist
6.desc: When Seth lands a Finishing Move on an enemy with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</ct>, it deals additional damage equal to 500% of his ATK. The attack is guaranteed to trigger a critical hit, and CRIT DMG is increased by 60%.

flavor.0: To a young person, everything is clear-cut, with a stark contrast between black and white, right and wrong.
flavor.1: There will always be someone who tries to tell him that the world is a murky gray. But is a world where everything is clear-cut and distinct really not worth striving for?
